item.title: Threat Hunting Phishing Domains in Golang
item.description: Starting point A few months ago, I decided to focus on Threat Hunting and what tool I could create to hunt myself and find malicious behavior and attackers. An idea occurred to me: many people in my entourage asked me if this “text message” or this “email” was legit, especially the URL link there. Of course 90% of the time, it was smishing or phishing campaigns. After that, I wondered how I could anticipate the attackers.
